com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api

Interface IConfigLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuroraConfigLoader, Base64ConfigLoader, DefaultConfigLoader, MesosConfig

    public interface IConfigLoader
    Config loader interface which will be used to parse and load scheduler config.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> getConfig()
      Return Map of (k,v) config loaded via IConfigLoader
      java.lang.String getLauncherClass()
      Returns launcher class name from config file.
      java.lang.String getPackingAlgorithmClass()
      Returns packing algorithm class.
      java.lang.String getRuntimeManagerClass()
      Returns IRuntimeManager class name from config file.
      java.lang.String getSchedulerClass()
      Returns scheduler class name from config file.
      java.lang.String getStateManagerClass()
      Returns IStateManager class name from config file.
      java.lang.String getUploaderClass()
      Returns uploader class name from config file.
      boolean isVerbose() 
      boolean load(java.lang.String configFile, java.lang.String cmdlineOverrides)
      Loads config file from disk.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        boolean load(java.lang.String configFile,
             java.lang.String cmdlineOverrides)
        Loads config file from disk.
        Parameters:
        configFile - location of scheduler config file.
        cmdlineOverrides - Commandline overrides passed to submitter. The override is encoded as String. SubmitterMain and SchedulerMain will pass all extra arguments as override.
        Returns:
        true, If successful in loading config. False if config verify failed.

      • getUploaderClass

        java.lang.String getUploaderClass()
        Returns uploader class name from config file.
        Returns:
        uploader class name. (Must implement IUploader)

      • getLauncherClass

        java.lang.String getLauncherClass()
        Returns launcher class name from config file.
        Returns:
        launcher class name. (Must implement ILauncher)

      • getSchedulerClass

        java.lang.String getSchedulerClass()
        Returns scheduler class name from config file.
        Returns:
        scheduler class name. (Must implement IScheduler).

      • getRuntimeManagerClass

        java.lang.String getRuntimeManagerClass()
        Returns IRuntimeManager class name from config file.
        Returns:
        IRuntimeManager class name. (Must implement IRuntimeManager).

      • getPackingAlgorithmClass

        java.lang.String getPackingAlgorithmClass()
        Returns packing algorithm class.

      • getStateManagerClass

        java.lang.String getStateManagerClass()
        Returns IStateManager class name from config file.
        Returns:

      • isVerbose

        boolean isVerbose()
        Returns:
        true to show the running details.
